name: Slow Cooker Black-Eyed Pea and Sausage Soup
author: Margaret Spencer Kepler
summary: Dried black-eyed peas and sausage are combined in this slow cooker soup with carrots, oregano, and garlic powder.  Allow 8 hours cooking time. Use whatever type of sausage you like, as long as it's either smoked or cooked before putting it in the slow cooker.
directions: Pour 10 cups water into a 5-quart slow cooker crock; add sausage, carrot, celery, onion, chicken bouillon, bay leaves, garlic powder, and oregano
Pour black-eyed peas into a saucepan; add enough water to cover by a few inches
Bring water to a boil, remove saucepan from heat, drain the peas, and add them to the slow cooker
Remove and discard bay leaves before serving
